concept.title: Requirements for dynamic changes
concept.shortdesc: Certain conditions must be met for to be able to load the new classes right away without you having to reboot.

ul.li: You originally configured database-level class loading for the database correctly. Turning on the database-level class loading property requires setting the derby.database.classpath property with valid two-part names, then rebooting.
If changes to the derby.database.classpath property are needed to reflect new jar files, you change the property to a valid value.

conbody.p: If these requirements are not met, you will have to reboot to see the changes.
